content:
mgattozzi commented on issue #3220:

There's some legitimate good reasons for the API design of tracing to use enter as it is today. It just leaves some footguns lying around that the only way to handle is "Read these docs that cover all of the ways this can go wrong". I'm just glad it's a relatively easy fix all things considered!
